about_the_game:
This soundtrack contains the main themed songs of Eternal Return. It includes Eternal World and its instrumental version.

Eternal World Lyrics Translation


Walking in circles, this place is like a routine that never ends (You fight, oh it's all right)
The weight of time closes in on me
A painful piece of the puzzle that cuts deeply, even when your eyes are closed in the dark (get out get out, get out get out)
Even my shadow has stopped (Eternal world)

I'm living in a long, hopeless breath
but I'll keep on living the life that has been given to me (Eternal world)
For me, living in repetition and trials,
You're the only thing I need (Eternal world)

I miss you with me back then, I'm trying to find us again,
It was bound to happen in this worn-out present
Time has flown and is still flowing away,
Now we must survive.

Your voice is clear inside my head, even when I cover my ears (oh come to light, oh it's all right)
My heart is racing
The pain creeps up as if I hold your hand as tight as I can (get out get out, get out get out)
The hands of the clock have stopped

I'm living in a long, hopeless breath,
but I'll keep on living the life that has been given to me (Eternal world)
For me, living in repetition and trials,
You're the only thing I need (Eternal world)

Wandering in the dark, my life filled with lies and hypocrisy
I'm so lonely in this world, I'm alone

Walking in circles, this place is like a routine that never ends (You fight, oh it's all right)
The weight of time closes in on me

This fear of not knowing what will happen every day (creeping up)
It's become more distinct (pain)
The life that was given to me (survive)
The light of this world (follow)
The hands of the clock have stopped (on and on I go)
(eternal world)

I'm living in a long, hopeless breath,
but I'll keep on living the life that has been given to me (Eternal world)
For me, living in repetition and trials,
You're the only thing I need (Eternal world)

name: Eternal Return Soundtrack

subs.option_text: Black Survival : Eternal Return Soundtrack - $2.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 24 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 173 MB available space

short_description: This soundtrack contains the main themed songs of Eternal Return: Black Survival. It includes Eternal World and its instrumental version.
